dmca.title: Report of Infringement
dmca.body:
Siam Global Associates Co., Ltd.
Suite 606, Nai Lert Building
87 Sukhumvit, Klongtoey,
Vadhana, Bangkok 10110
Tel: (662) 650-3510 (-12)
Fax (662) 655 0655
email: sgalegal@cscoms.com
www.sgalegal.com

20 March 2007

Total Pages: 70
By Registered Mail

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

CC: Owaki Kenji
Managined Director
HQ Group Co., Ltd.
3/31 Samlan Road, T. Phrasing,
A. Muang,Chiang Mai 50200

Re: Report of Infringement

Dear Google Legal Support:

We are writing to inform you of an infringement of our client's website www.hqpapermaker.com/about-hq/. We request that you take appropriate action to prevent further publication of the infringing webpage since such publication is illegal under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act, Thailand law and international treaties.

In accordance with the categories you have set out on your website, we inform as follows:

1. The copyrighted works at issue are the text published on the following webpages

1.1 "About HQ from HQ Papermake" that appears at www.hqpapermaker.com/about-hq (Exhibit1).

1.2 "Quick Order Page from HQ Papermaker" that appears at www.hqpapermaker.com/quick/ (Exhibit 2).

1.3 "Wholesaler & Distributor Information from HQ Papermaker" that appears at www.hqpapermaker.com/wholesalers/ (Exhibit 3).

1.4 Free Mulberry Paper/Saa Paper Samples from HQ Papermaker" that appears at www.hqpapermaker.com/free (Exhibit 4).

2. The infringing material can be accessed using the following search query:

2.1 Search Query: "Yishuzhi Shangba-;a"
Infringing webpage: "www.yishuzhi.com/our-paper/indez.htm" (Exhibit 5)

2.2 Search Query: "Yishuzhi Wholesalers"
Infringing webpage: "www.yishuzhi.com/wholesalers/index.htm" (Exhibit 6)

2.3 Search Query: "Yishuzhi Quick Index"
Infringing webpage: "www.yishuzhi.com/quick/index.htm" (Exhibit 7)

2.4 Search Query: "Yishuzhi Collection"
Infringing webpage: "www.yishuzhi.com/free/index.htm" (Exhibit 8).

3. E-mail address of Siam Global Associates authorized representative of HQ Group Co., Ltd.: sgalegal@cscoms.com

E-mail address of HQ PaperMaker, the owner of the website that has been infringed upon: ko@hqpapermaker.com. (See Exhibit 9 for the Network Solutions domain name registry for hqpapermaker.com)

4. E-mail address of Handicraft Paper, the owner of the website with the infringing material:Heyes@126.com. (See Exhibit 10 for the Network Solutions domain name registry information for yishuzhi.com)

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. <signature>

Thank you for your attention to this matter. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,

Sawitree Ngakom
Attorney at Law/
Anshisa Sukmakanan
